hints.label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
hints.title: Revival Operator is KL-Expansive (VERIFIED)
hints.content:
1201: :label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
1202: 
1203: The mean-field revival operator $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ **increases** the KL-divergence to the invariant measure $\pi$:
1204: 
1205: $$
1206: \frac{d}{dt} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \pi) \Big|_{\text{revival}} > 0 \quad \text{for all } \rho \neq \pi, \, m_d > 0
1207: 
1208: $$
hints.raw_directive:
1198: **Conclusion**: Since $D_{\text{KL}} \ge 0$, $\lambda > 0$, $m_d > 0$, and $\|\rho\|_{L^1} > 0$, the entropy production is **strictly positive**.
1199: 
1200: :::{prf:theorem} Revival Operator is KL-Expansive (VERIFIED)
1201: :label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
1202: 
1203: The mean-field revival operator $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ **increases** the KL-divergence to the invariant measure $\pi$:
1204: 
1205: $$
1206: \frac{d}{dt} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \pi) \Big|_{\text{revival}} > 0 \quad \text{for all } \rho \neq \pi, \, m_d > 0
1207: 
1208: $$
1209:

hints.label: thm-joint-not-contractive
hints.title: Joint Jump Operator NOT Unconditionally Contractive (VERIFIED)
hints.raw_directive:
1224: - **Negative** when $\|\rho\|_{L^1} > \frac{\lambda}{\lambda + \kappa}$ (contractive above equilibrium)
1225: 
1226: :::{prf:theorem} Joint Jump Operator NOT Unconditionally Contractive (VERIFIED)
1227: :label: thm-joint-not-contractive
1228:
